description:
This PR addresses a number of problems with field detection and fixes Issue #887. It generally follows the philosophy that it's best to detect an error and raise an exception as early as possible, rather than relying on later logic to handle invalid state.

 - Moves chunking calls below error checks in several functions to avoid unnecessary I/O
 - `Index._split_fields` will reject any fields not explicitly in field_list or derived_field_list
 - `DataSet._get_field_info` will not return a cached field_info object when only the field name has been compared
 - `YTDataContainer._determine_fields` now checks that a given field type, field name pair (or naked field name) exists somewhere in field_list, derived_field_list, or _container_fields when the type is detected or changed

Tacked on PR:
I noticed lately a rash of dead code/unused variables being removed in PRs and decided to try a pass through pylint.  This removes any unused variables caught by pylint that were obvious by eye (ignoring the frontends directory).

Several fairly obvious bugs were caught, and a few calls to enumerate were removed.  Please double check if those were necessary for some non-obvious reason.
title: Field Detection bug fixes and dead code removal
